Light - Shadows Fighting

-=-=-=- Controls

wasd/arrow keys to move

every attack uses some light From The Light Bar , When The Light Bar vanish 

the player will lose

Right Mouse button To Throw A Boomerang That Returns To You and Damages all the enemys Hit By It

left mous Button To Shoot A Swarm Of Bullets 

Go To The _How To Play_ section first to know how to play
